title: Raiz Rewards: Eh, Dell?
description: Klik sini untuk Bahasa Melayu 05/03/2022   We have good news for you! You can now get your electronics from Dell through Raiz Rewards!
body:
![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/39-1.png)

__[Klik sini untuk Bahasa Melayu](https://raiz.com.my/blog/raiz-rewards-eh-dell-2/)__

__05/03/2022__

We have good news for you! You can now get your electronics from __Dell__ through Raiz Rewards!

__Why should you shop with Dell?__

__Dell__ continues to innovate, developing technology so that their clients are always ready to move forward. Dell offers numerous products and services including laptops, monitors, computers, storage solutions, and servers for your home and business.

__Why should you shop with Dell through Raiz Rewards?__

Shop online now with Dell through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get __1.47%__ of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account!

In fact, when you shop with \*any\* of our brand partners through Raiz Rewards, you will receive a cash reward which will be invested back into your Raiz Investment Account.

So, as you shop, you invest! Be on your way to receive a cash reward just by clicking the __“Shop Online Here”__ button through Raiz Rewards\*.

*__\*Terms & Conditions apply.__*

Check out some promotions by __Dell__ below.

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/17-1.png)

__*Inspiron 15 3000 Laptop*__

Starting Price: RM1,848.99

Online Price: __RM1,648.99__

Save: __RM 200.00__

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/16-1.png)

__*Inspiron Compact Desktop*__

__Clearance!__

Starting Price: RM 2,649.00

Online Price: __RM 2,349.00__

Save: __RM 300.00__

____Also, check out our other brand partners below!__

__Shopee__

__(+ up to 6.4% invested)__

__Shopee__ is Malaysia’s #1 shopping platform for baby & kids essentials, toys, fashion & electronic items, and more!

Purchase online now with __Shopee__ through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get __up to 6.4%__ of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account.

__Lazada__

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2021/12/37.png)

__(+ up to 9.1% invested)__

__Lazada__ offers the best prices online, while also giving you the best assortment of brands and products, delivered right to your doorstep!

Shop online now with __Lazada__ through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get __up to__ __9.1%__ of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account.
